post:
100% Satisfaction Guaranteed or Money Back!

EURO-SPACE has been trusted and reliable provider in web hosting since 2007.

EURO-SPACE offers unmanaged or self-managed VPS hosting bundled with industry leading software on Supermicro servers packed with ECC-RAM and RAID-10 Drives. Every VPS node is powered by OpenVZ virtualization software.
Choose from a wide selection of operating systems and add-ons like DirectAdmin or cPanel/WHM for more features and control. Our team of skilled and experienced VPS engineers are 100% dedicated to providing you with the best VPS hosting experience.

Our VPS servers are completely dedicated to your account. A Virtual Private server can be used for a wide variety of purposes, including gaming, virtual (i.e., shared) hosting, and hosting of traffic-intensive Web sites.



EURO-SPACE VPS Hosting Features:

+ UK or US datacenters
+ 15 day money back guarantee
+ 24x7 Technical Support
+ FREE dedicated IP address
+ Intel Xeon Multi-processor multi-core VPS Nodes
+ Registered ECC RAM packed VPS nodes, with generous reserves
+ Fully redundant 8x RAID-10 drive arrays for faster I/O
+ Quality Supermicro servers in our own Colo Cages
+ Never Oversold, your allowances are dedicated to only you
+ Root/Admin Access
+ Unlimited inbound bandwidth
+ FREE Enom Domain Reseller account
+ WHM/Cpanel VPS optimized for just EUR 10.99/ month
+ Choice of OS; CentOS, Debian 5 Lenny, Debian 6 Squeeze, Fedora 13, Fedora 14, Fedora 15, SUSE 11.3, SUSE 11.4, Ubuntu 9.10, Ubuntu 10.10, Ubuntu 11.04, AltLinux 5.1, Arch Linux 2010.05, Gentoo 10.1, Scientific Linux 6, Slackware 13.37

FAQ:

Do you allow adult content?
YES, we allow legal adult content


Do you allow Torrents, IRC's, VPN's, and Proxies?
Yes, for now but this may change if we begin to see abuse.


What locations are available?
Our datacenters are located in Atlanta, Dallas, L.A. and the UK. We are happy to accommodate any location but do not advertise them as available, they may not be without delays for new equipment. Depending on demand we tend to stock various areas faster than others.


I am currently with a reseller provider and want to offer reseller accounts. Can I create reseller accounts with a VPS?
Yes you can. You will get root access and adding software such as cPanel/WHM makes those tasks much simplier. With cPanel you can create reseller accounts just as you would on a dedicated server.


Do you offer an uptime guarantee?
Yes we offer a 99.9% uptime SLA guarantee on the Network and VPS hardware node the contains your VPS. As long as you can reach the network and the server, we have done our part. What goes inside your VPs is up to you.


Sign up now or visit http://www.euro-space.net/ for more info.
